name: describedBy
description: One or more element IDs to add to the input `aria-describedby` attribute without a fieldset, used to provide additional descriptive information for screenreader users.

name: fieldset
description: Options for the fieldset component (e.g. legend).

name: hint
description: Options for the hint component (e.g. text).

name: errorMessage
description: Options for the error message component. The error message component will not display if you use a falsy value for `errorMessage`, for example `false` or `null`.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the form group (e.g. to show error state for the whole group)

name: idPrefix
description: String to prefix id for each checkbox item if no id is specified on each item. If not passed, fall back to using the name option instead.

name: name
description: Name attribute for all checkbox items.

params.name: text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within each checkbox item label. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML to use within each checkbox item label. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: id
params.description: Specific id attribute for the checkbox item. If omitted, then idPrefix option will be applied.

params.name: name
params.description: Specific name for the checkbox item. If omitted, then component global `name` string will be applied.

params.name: label
params.description: Provide attributes and classes to each checkbox item label.

params.name: hint
params.description: Provide hint to each checkbox item.

params.name: checked
params.description: If true, checkbox will be checked.

params.name: conditional
params.description: If true, content provided will be revealed when the item is checked.

params.name: conditional.html
params.description: Provide content for the conditional reveal.

params.name: disabled
params.description: If true, checkbox will be disabled.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the checkbox input tag.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the checkboxes container.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the anchor tag.
